item.title: Exploring My Own Spotify Usage
item.description: Spotify does an incredible job of personalizing the user experience, using machine learning to curate daily playlists based on past listening habits, and surfacing new music recommendations via the Your Discover Weekly. Spotify’s CEO recently noted on an earnings call that their secret sauce is online experimentation – running tests on its ~300M users, and using the learnings to improve its products. Two of the ways that Spotify evaluates the effectiveness of their experiments are (1) measuring increased engagement (streaming for longer periods of time), and (2) increased user retention (repeatedly returning to use Spotify’s products in the future).
